```{r load pre-computed}

                     header=TRUE,
                     row.names=1)

load('data/oeHBCTree.Rdata')

```
##
```{r, echo=FALSE} 
root = 'OEP01_N707_S504'


hdTree <- applySimplePPT(counts)
p <- TreeProjection(name = "PPT", pData = round(exp(counts)),
                    vData = round(exp(hdTree$princPnts)), adjMat = hdTree$adjMat)
pt = pseudotimeProjection(p, root)
z <- zinbFit(round(exp(counts)))
lsObjLP <- testProjectionLineages(p, root)
lsObjLP <- testPathLineages(p, pt[1:5], root)
lsSiGenes <- testSigGenes(lsObjLP)
idx <-colnames(counts) %in% pt$`path 9_10_19_6`$data$cell
objLp <- runLineagePulse(round(exp(counts[,idx])), dfAnnotation = pt$`path 9_10_19_6`$data)


```
